title: Chai Shai
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Pakistani, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian dishes are written in green type-face. All vegan dishes are marked with an asterisk. About half of the dishes are vegetarian with a few being vegan; the remaining vegetarian dishes cannot be made vegan. Most of the specialty drinks use cow's milk, but the owner will gladly use vegan milk if you bring your own.
